Header.title: Expert Braiders Delivered to Your Door
Header.paragraph: We are your premier destination for mobile African hair braiding in Austin, Round Rock, Pflugerville, Cedar Park, Georgetown, Kyle, Buda, and San Marcos TX. We offer both salon and home/mobile visits.

About.paragraph: Ruth here, your Austin expert in African hair braiding. I began braiding hair as a side hustle while studying in college. Creative, skilled, and passionate, I quickly mastered the craft and began teaching others about hair care and protective styling. For over 10 years, I’ve been a professional braider, now bringing high-quality mobile braiding to Austin and surrounding areas. After years of serving clients in Austin, I relocated to Texas to launch Austin Mobile Hair Braiding. I truly love transforming hair and helping women feel confident through beautiful protective styles. If you searched for “hair braiding near me in Austin,” you just found the best!
Why: Experienced Braider – 10+ years of professional African hair braiding.
Healthy Hair First – Techniques designed to protect and grow natural hair.
Why2: Mobile Convenience – Expert braiding services delivered to your home.
Educator’s Touch – Guidance on maintenance so your braids last longer.

Testimonials.text: Liz is amazing! She braided my hair at home and made the whole experience so convenient. My braids look flawless and she cared about my hair health too. Best mobile braider in Austin!
Testimonials.name: Ariel M.

Testimonials.text: First time getting braids and Liz made me feel so comfortable. She explained everything and gave care tips. I’m obsessed with my knotless braids! Highly recommend if you want African hair braiding near you in Austin.
Testimonials.name: Bianca L.

Testimonials.text: I love that Liz travels! I didn’t have to leave my house. She is quick, gentle, and talented. I got so many compliments on my boho braids. Worth every penny!
